parse.title: List of Dalida music in motion pictures and TV

text.*:
Dalida was a French singer, actress, dancer and record producer. Her songs have often appeared as soundtrack in movies and TV series, sometimes her originals, and sometimes covers.

The following Dalida songs have appeared in the formentioned motion pictures or TV series during and after her life:

Year Motion picture Songs Director Ref
1959 Girls for the Mambo-Bar "Am Tag, als der Regen kam" Wolfgang Glück
1977 Dalida pour toujours Principal singer on entire soundtrack Michel Dumoulin [1]
1979 Série noire "Le Lambeth Walk" Alain Corneau [2]
1984 La Triche "Fini, la comédie" and "Je suis toutes les femmes" Yannick Bellon [3]
1991 Hors la vie (a.k.a. "Out of Life") "Salma ya salama" Maroun Bagdadi [4]
1994 Mina Tannenbaum "Il venait d'avoir 18 ans" Martine Dugowson [5]
1995 Gazon Maudit (a.k.a. "French Twist") "Histoire d'un amour" Josiane Balasko [6]
1995 Pigalle Unknown Karim Dridi [7]
1996 Pédale douce "Bambino", "Salma ya salama" and "Je suis toutes les femmes" Gabriel Aghion [8]
1996 Un Air de Famille (a.k.a. "Family Resemblances" (US)) "Come prima" Cédric Klapisch [9]
1997 On connaît la chanson

a.k.a. "Same Old Song" (US)

"Paroles, paroles" Alain Resnais [10]
1997 Mémoires d'immigrés, l'héritage maghrébin "Helwa ya baladi" Yamina Benguigui [11]
1998 A Soldier's Daughter Never Cries

a.k.a. "La fille d'un soldat ne pleure jamais" (France) a.k.a. "Soldier's Daughter Never Cries" (Australia: TV title)

"Ciao amore ciao" James Ivory [12]
1999 Novios "Gigi l'Amoroso" Joaquín Oristrell [13]
1999 Recto/Verso "Paroles, paroles" Jean-Marc Longval [14]
1999 Tontaine et Tonton "Il venait d'avoir 18 ans" and "Gigi l'amoroso" Tonie Marshall [15]
1999 Un pont entre deux rives a.k.a. "The Bridge" Unknown Gérard Depardieu [16]
2001 Souffle "Buenas noches mi amor" Muriel Coulin and Delphine Coulin [17]
2001 Mauvais genres

a.k.a. "Transfixed" (Canada: English title: festival title) (US) a.k.a. "Bad Genres" (International: English title: festival title) a.k.a. "Gender Bias" (US)

"Il venait d'avoir 18 ans" Francis Girod [18]
2001 Absolument fabuleux "Il venait d'avoir 18 ans" Gabriel Aghion [19]
2001 C'est la vie "Darla dirladada" Jean-Pierre Améris [20]
2001 Paroles de Bibs "Paroles, paroles" Jocelyne Lemaire-Darnaud [21]
20XX La Bonne Addresse "Pezzettini di bikini" Gary Goldman [22]
2002 L'Adversaire a.k.a. "The Adversary" "Histoire d'un amour" Nicole Garcia [23]
2003 Perduto Amor "Itsi bitsi petit bikini" Franco Battiato [24]
2005 Dalida Principal singer on entire soundtrack Joyce Buñuel [25]
2005 L'un reste, l'autre part "Il venait d'avoir 18 ans" Claude Berri [26]
2005 The Secret Life of Words (International: English title) (UK) (US)

a.k.a. "La vida secreta de las palabras" (Spain) a.k.a. "La vida secreta de les paraules" (Spain: Catalan title)

"Histoire d'un amour" Isabel Coixet [27]
2006 OSS 117, Le Caire nid d'espions

a.k.a. "OSS 117, Nest of Spies"

"Bambino" Michel Hazanavicius [28]
2007 Michou D'Auber "Bambino" Thomas Gilou [29]
2007 L'Ennemi intime

a.k.a. "Intimate Enemies" (Canada: English title)

"Come prima" Florent Emilio Siri [30]
2008 Mesrine : L'Instinct de mort "Romantica" and "La Danse de Zorba" Jean-François Richet [31]
2010 Les Amours Imaginaires (Canada: Original title)

a.k.a. "Heartbeats" (US) (Europe: English title: festival title)

a.k.a. Fantastikes agapes (Greece: Greek title) a.k.a. Love, Imagined (International: English title)

"Bang Bang" Xavier Dolan [32]
2011 Les femmes du 6è étage (France: Original title)

a.k.a. "Las chicas de la 6ª planta" (Spanish title) a.k.a. "The Women on the 6th Floor" (English title) a.k.a. "Service Entrance"

"Itsi bitsi petit bikini" Philippe Le Guay [33]
2011 Le Skylab "Bambino" Julie Delpy [34]
2014 Apprenti Gigolo "La Violetera" and "Le Torrent" John Turturro [35]
2017 Dalida Principal singer on entire soundtrack Lisa Azuelos [36]
2018 Love Addict "Monday, Tuesday...Laissez-moi danser" Frank Bellocq
